title: Shinylive in Quarto
text:
#| viewerHeight: 600

library(shiny)
library(shinyWidgets)
library(BH)

ui <- fluidPage(
materialSwitch(inputId = "id", label = "Primary switch", status = "danger")
)

server <- function(input, output) {
}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
